name: Simple Raider: Solo
description:
WARNING BUG! Try to avoid hitting buttons that don't have skills assign, it will prevent you from using your skills for the rest of the game. I found the bug after the jam ended so I can't reupload till voting is over.

Simple Raider is an easy to play co-op game where you and two of your friends take on a boss together! However doing it Solo surely takes the simple out of the game. Manage 3 Raiders at the same time while dodging the boss's attacks

Both the Tank and the DPS will auto attack the boss, and the only way to get health back is from the healer's skills.  The dodge can be used to quickly get out of a sticky situation but beware you are not able to use it too often.

Controls 

A/D: Dodge left and right

Tank:

Q: Personal Shield

DPS:

Q: Volley

Healer:

Q: Heal Tank

W: Heal DPS

E: Heal Healer
